alert.note: Alert for Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 22 at 3:53AM CST until January 23 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 this morning. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected tonight. * WHERE...Upper Terrebonne Parish, and Upper Lafourche Parish. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hard freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. Remember to provide pets and livestock with warm shelter and unfrozen drinking water.
